modern-co2-scatter.png.description: Scatter plot showing global CO2 levels over time, rising and falling from January 2010 to December 2023
modern-co2-scatter.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap team, with data from http://scrippsco2.ucsd.edu/data/atmospheric_co2

recent-co2-scatter.description: Scatter plot showing global CO2 levels over time, rising from December 2022 to May 2023, then dropping to December 2023. a few lighter dots are present from before December 2022 to hint at the nature of the curve.
recent-co2-scatter.source: Created by the Bootstrap team, with data from http://scrippsco2.ucsd.edu/data/atmospheric_co2
